body.p:
Lebanon May 1st 1861
To His Excellency
Hon B. Magoffin.

A vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace exists in this county in District No. 4, we would therefore recommend to the consideration of your Excellency Joseph A. Hall as a person well Suited to fill that position.

Respectfully yours
N. N. Hughes
W. C. Jarboe
N. T. Berry
James M Fogle
J B Wathen

Marion Co
J. P.
Dist No. 4.
Jos. A Hall
